mapper.select: SELECT po.productId, p.productName AS productName, po.purchasePrice, po.purchaseQty, (po.purchasePrice * po.purchaseQty) AS totalPrice FROM purchaseOrder po JOIN product p ON po.productId = p.productId WHERE po.orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchaseOrder (orderId, productId, purchasePrice, purchaseQty) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{purchasePrice}, #{purchaseQty})
